gen:link.msg:message: `ReceivablesFromCentralCashAndHealthCareInsuranceFund` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ReceivablesFromCentralCashAndHealthCareInsuranceFund')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ReceivablesFromCentralCashAndHealthCareInsuranceFund return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfReceivablesFromCentralCashAndHealthCareInsuranceFundDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfReceivablesFromCentralCashAndHealthCareInsuranceFundDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfReceivablesFromCentralCashAndHealthCareInsuranceFundCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfReceivablesFromCentralCashAndHealthCareInsuranceFundCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
